desc.en: Ayane tries to repair the helicopter by herself but eventually collapses from exhaustion. Sensei convinces Ayane that it's important to take care of her health, helps her repair the helicopter, and then takes a commemorative photo of her.
desc.jp: Ayane tries to repair the helicopter by herself but eventually collapses from exhaustion. Sensei convinces Ayane that it's important to take care of her health, helps her repair the helicopter, and then takes a commemorative photo of her.
desc.zh_cn: 没办法抛弃急躁的心情，并独自修理着直升机的{cf绫音}最后因为虚脱而昏倒。老师好好地劝导{cf绫音}，说管理自己的身体状况是很重要的事，之后一起帮忙修理直升机并帮{cf绫音}拍了纪念照。

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 记录家庭账本、古董收集
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 记录家庭账本、古董收集

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 记录家庭账本、古董收集
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 记录家庭账本、古董收集

name.en: What I Want to Show You
name.jp: What I Want to Show You

desc.en: Chise suddenly calls Sensei, saying that there's something she wants to share. After walking quite a distance with Chise, Sensei encounters a huge group of turtles.
desc.jp: Chise suddenly calls Sensei, saying that there's something she wants to share. After walking quite a distance with Chise, Sensei encounters a huge group of turtles.
desc.zh_cn: {cf知世}突然说有东西想要给老师看，便找了老师出来。和{cf知世}走了好长一段路的老师，最后看到的是为数众多的乌龟群。

hobby.jp: 俳句

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

hobby.jp: 俳句

desc.en: Sensei arrives at the beach at Hinata's request. Hinata has spread out her sun bed and parasol but isn't getting much rest because she's feeling uneasy. Sensei reassures her, and Hinata falls asleep on the sun bed.
desc.jp: Sensei arrives at the beach at Hinata's request. Hinata has spread out her sun bed and parasol but isn't getting much rest because she's feeling uneasy. Sensei reassures her, and Hinata falls asleep on the sun bed.
desc.zh_cn: 老师收到{cf日向}的联系，来到海边。{cf日向}打开沙滩躺椅和遮阳伞，但却因为心里不自在而无法好好休息。老师让{cf日向}放下心来，{cf日向}终于在沙滩躺椅上睡着。

hobby.jp: お祈り、整理整頓

desc.en: Hoshino searches for her own comfortable place to rest by searching an old, marked-up map. Hoshino finds a good spot with Sensei, and they enjoy a nice nap there.
desc.jp: Hoshino searches for her own comfortable place to rest by searching an old, marked-up map. Hoshino finds a good spot with Sensei, and they enjoy a nice nap there.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}看着以前住在渡假胜地的房客在导览地图上标记的场所，开始寻找适合自己休息的地方。最后{cf星野}终于和老师一起找到适合的地方，并在那里享受舒适的午觉。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Upon Hoshino's request for help, Sensei goes to the beach to collect seafood with her. There, Hoshino opens up about how she doesn't want the team to have any expectations for her.
desc.jp: Upon Hoshino's request for help, Sensei goes to the beach to collect seafood with her. There, Hoshino opens up about how she doesn't want the team to have any expectations for her.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在收到{cf星野}的求助请求后来到了海边，并和{cf星野}一起采集海鲜。但是在老师的帮助下，采集了太多的海鲜，{cf星野}反过来抱怨说采集海鲜似乎变成了工作。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

name.jp: I Want to Read Your Mind

name.zh_cn: 和{cf伊树菜}一起千钧一发！

desc.en: One hot day, Izuna uses her training as an excuse for sand-bathing. However, Izuna feels so cozy in the sand that she falls asleep.
desc.jp: One hot day, Izuna uses her training as an excuse for sand-bathing. However, Izuna feels so cozy in the sand that she falls asleep.
desc.zh_cn: 盛夏的某一天。{cf伊树菜}拿和老师修行为借口，也尝试做沙浴。但是因为在沙子内实在太舒服，{cf伊树菜}就那样睡着了。

desc.en: Sensei and Miyako travel to an uninhabited island by walking across a drained mudflat to spend some leisure time together. Miyako is captivated by the beauty of the island and loses track of time, missing the opportunity to return before the tide rises again. While passing time waiting for the next low tide, they stumble upon a group of rabbits.
desc.jp: Sensei and Miyako travel to an uninhabited island by walking across a drained mudflat to spend some leisure time together. Miyako is captivated by the beauty of the island and loses track of time, missing the opportunity to return before the tide rises again. While passing time waiting for the next low tide, they stumble upon a group of rabbits.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cf都子}一起经过退潮的泥滩，前往无人岛玩耍。{cf都子}为了参观美丽的小岛，错过了回去的时间。{cf都子}和老师一边等待下次退潮一边杀时间，偶然在岛上发现了一群兔子。

desc.en: After receiving a MomoTalk message, Sensei finds Ui at the edge of the beach. Ui says she came to the beach because she felt overwhelmed by all of the attention, and Sensei tells her that other people also get away to be comfortable, just like Ui.
desc.jp: After receiving a MomoTalk message, Sensei finds Ui at the edge of the beach. Ui says she came to the beach because she felt overwhelmed by all of the attention, and Sensei tells her that other people also get away to be comfortable, just like Ui.
desc.zh_cn: 老师收到MomoTalk后，在海岸的角落里找到了{cf忧}。{cf忧}是因为周围的视线会让他感到压力，所以才跑来海边，老师告诉他，{sn其他}人跟他一样，也是为了放松而来到海边的。

desc.en: Sensei oversleeps at the resort. While Sensei is letting Hoshino nap, the two are attacked by Wakamo on a hovercraft and the Helmet Gangsters.
desc.jp: Sensei oversleeps at the resort. While Sensei is letting Hoshino nap, the two are attacked by Wakamo on a hovercraft and the Helmet Gangsters.
desc.zh_cn: 睡过头的老师与{cf星野}度过了一段悠闲的时光。就在其他{cn对策委员会}的成员们都在修理直升机，老师与{cf星野}打算继续悠哉下去的时候，渡假胜地防卫系统突然发出了警报。乘坐着巨大气垫船的{cf若藻}为了夺回老师再度攻了过来。

{sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.en: The Truth of the Resort Ticket Part 1
name.jp: The Truth of the Resort Ticket Part 1
name.zh_cn: 渡假胜地使用券的真相（１）

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force wins the final battle and Rabu tells them of an unexpected truth about resort usage rights, resort hunting, and a situation in the surrounding archipelago.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force wins the final battle and Rabu tells them of an unexpected truth about resort usage rights, resort hunting, and a situation in the surrounding archipelago.
desc.zh_cn: 大家成功击退了{cf若藻}以及头盔团。向他们询问为何如此坚持要袭击这里时，他们表明了自己也有相同的渡假胜地使用券，并而他们也只不过是围绕着这个失乐园渡假胜地使用券展开渡假胜地战斗的集团之一而已。大家决定在事态失控之前尽早离开这里。

hobby.jp: 破壊、略奪
貯金、アルバイト

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.jp: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，阿拜多斯高中的主题曲。常用于阿拜多斯高中成员出现且情况转好时。一个比较著名的使用例是大家在计划救出星野的时候。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: After changing into swimsuits, Shizuko and the others go on an adventure with the members of Abydos to retrieve contracts from the various forces at the Lost Paradise Resort.
desc.jp: After changing into swimsuits, Shizuko and the others go on an adventure with the members of Abydos to retrieve contracts from the various forces at the Lost Paradise Resort.
desc.zh_cn: 于准备前往{sn其他}岛屿的途中，确认了仁耶搜集的目前势力图的一行人。因分成了几座群岛，{sn阿拜多斯}及{sn百鬼夜行}便兵分两路前往回收契约书。

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!

为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: The first place Shizuko and the others arrive in is an area occupied by a force called the Sulfur Miners. What they encounter there is...
desc.jp: The first place Shizuko and the others arrive in is an area occupied by a force called the Sulfur Miners. What they encounter there is...
desc.zh_cn: {cf静子}们最初前往的是，「寻找梦幻温泉的硫磺矿工们」所占领的岛屿。那里有着，打算挖掘海洋深层水以打造深海温泉渡假胜地的格黑娜{cn温泉开发部}的身影──

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
